Lebron James isn't the only one making news in Akron, OH today!  Exciting announcements to come from the newly formed Akron General Health & Wellness Innovations group. We are building on our decades of success in the health & wellness industry with new "Innovations" (had to use the term right?) such as Wellness Access Centers and SimpleTrends Wellness based software.  This is going to be fun!

So happy for my twin brother Mike Edwards and his wife Kasey who welcomed healthy twin boys to the world yesterday!  It's a nice reminder of what truly matters in life besides "running on the hamster wheel" as fast as you can."

"We are currently looking to fill four new positions (1-President   2-Director, Operations Management  3-Analyst / Project Manager  4-Administrative Assistant)  We are going to be opening a new office in downtown Akron at Signet Centre and are looking for the right people to help us continue to build on our nationally recognized offering. I have been asked to lead the American Heart Association Campaign for Akron General Health System.  It is quite an honor and something I am happy to do as my family - like many others - has been touched by heart disease.  Please consider joining my team and walking with my family on October 19th starting at the University of Akron Field House.   Please consider helping my team reach our goal and we hope to walk with you in the fall!
